description:
Superword is a word-guessing game. You have 6 tries to guess a word. Each guess must be a valid word. You have the option to play with 4-, 5-, or 6-letter words. You can choose to start with certain letters showing – either the first letter, 1 or 2 random letters, or no letters.
After each guess, Superword marks letters in the correct position with green and correct letters in the wrong position with orange.  The fewer the guesses you use, the more the points you earn. Two difficulty levels are available. SuperWord keeps track of your points, hints, average guesses per word, and unused letters. You can hide a guessed word and challenge a friend to guess it (tap Guess). When entering guesses, you can type the whole word or just the missing letters. Have up to 4 games running and swap between them at any time. Pass words to another player (tap New). Compete on points or average guesses per word.
Hints are available to assist you and are earned through good guessing.
 *Hint 1: show in pink the location of hidden vowels.
 *Hint 2: remove half the remaining unused letters.
 *Hint 3: show in blue the locations of a hidden letter that appears more than once.
Good strategy involves using words with no repeated letters and words with many vowel combinations. Note: a guessed letter may appear more than once and some words may have more than one letter repeated.
